ghostPost.title: Introduction to SFDC Guide
ghostPost.html:
I made this video as the channel introduction for the sfdc.guide youtube channel.

I’m hoping to generate a lot of new content this year, and wanted to start by giving potential subscribers an idea of what to expect, as well as to introduce myself — I realized that I had simply jumped into creating videos without ever mentioning anything about my background.

As I mention in the video, I have some other hobbies outside of my work, some of which I document in my personal website and some on the website I created for the photographs I take while I travel.

Thanks for tuning in! I hope as always that this content is helpful and I welcome feedback. Cheers!
